Name: Wisp
Script: Before Combat: if(target.getskillcard().name == ~Robot Calculate~){ giveequipment(~Capitalize~[;] true[;] false); giveequipment(~Exploit~[;] true[;] false); self.dice = 3; self.equipment.remove(~Fool's Fire~); self.equipment.remove(~Burning Light~); self.equipment.remove(~Burning Light~); self.innate = []; }
Last Words 1: Daaaa! Daaa! Da-doo! Bounce bounce!||I love it when you contestants win[;]|your victory song is so much fun!
Last Words Endgame: BOUNCE BOUNCE BOUNCE!||Yippeeee! You can do it!
